title: EV fleet lease with residual guarantee
credit_model: Segment score must exceed 640; max DTI 45%
risk_rules: Require OEM telematics feed for mileage & battery health
Escrow equal to one monthly payment for first 6 months
Decline applicants with >1 insolvency event in last 3 years
pricing_adjusters: -0.25% APR when delivering carbon reporting quarterly
faq: Designed for SMEs running electric delivery vans; residual risk covered by remarketing partner.

title: Green lease for heavy goods vehicles
early_termination_policy: Exit fee = 1.5x monthly payment, waiver if total loss
risk_rules: Cross-border operations must cap exposure to 30% of fleet
Fuel hedging required if diesel surcharge clause absent
Driver safety program evidence within 90 days
pricing_adjusters: -0.15% APR for telematics-based safe driving scores > 82
+0.3% APR if contract currency not EUR/GBP
faq: Targets operators upgrading to compliant tractors; focuses on uptime and safety metrics.

title: Retail BEV lease with loyalty rebate
early_termination_policy: 1-month fee if terminated after 18 months and vehicle resold within 45 days
credit_model: Credit bureau score >= 700; delinquency-free past 24 months
risk_rules: Require home charging proof or workplace charging access
Cap balloon payment at 15% of MSRP
If battery SOH < 80% at return, apply OEM-backed guarantee
pricing_adjusters: +0.2% APR for rural postal codes without charging infra
faq: Simplified retail lease for BEVs; emphasizes loyalty and charging readiness.

title: Fast-approval LCV lease
early_termination_policy: Return anytime after 12 months; pay 1-month fee
credit_model: Bank statements for last 6 months; average monthly inflow > $5k
risk_rules: Require GPS kill-switch consent
Income volatility >35% triggers manual review
No repossessions in past 24 months
pricing_adjusters: -0.3% APR with verified delivery platform contracts
faq: Optimized for gig drivers needing quick access to vans with minimal documentation.

title: Municipal e-bus lease with infrastructure wrap
early_termination_policy: Termination allowed only for funding loss; cure period 120 days
credit_model: Require binding budget appropriation; investment-grade rating
risk_rules: Charging EPC contractor performance bond required
Battery warranty assignment to lessor
Sovereign risk addendum for cross-border deployments
pricing_adjusters: +0.35% APR if currency mismatch not hedged
faq: Long-tenor lease for electrified public transport with infra risk coverage.

title: Remarketing-partnered lease
early_termination_policy: Early swap allowed per vehicle after 9 months; remarketing fee 1.25%
risk_rules: Dealers must share lot-turn data weekly
Cap aged inventory (>120 days) at 12% of pool
Repossession cadence SLA 10 business days

title: Fleet flex-mileage lease
early_termination_policy: Mileage pooling allowed; end-of-term true-up only
credit_model: Rating >= BBB- or internal equivalent; stable cash flow outlook
risk_rules: Charge per-mile overage at $0.09; waive up to 5% variance
Mandate quarterly fleet utilization reports
If utilization < 75% for 2 quarters, trigger renegotiation
pricing_adjusters: +0.3% APR if utilization reporting is manual
faq: Flexible mileage program for corporate fleets; uses pooling to reduce penalties.

title: Cross-border lease with FX guardrails
early_termination_policy: FX breach clause: unwind allowed if hedges fail beyond 8%
credit_model: Require FX hedging program; audited coverage ratio >= 0.8
risk_rules: Local guarantor required in each operating country
Monitor trade finance line utilization monthly
Cap uninsured export receivables at 20% of revenue
pricing_adjusters: -0.2% APR if hedged with rated counterparty
faq: Mitigates FX and cross-border credit risk for exporters running trucks.
